courses.qualifications: Must be enrolled in or have completed a computer science degree, or equivalent. Must meet the qualifications to TA *ALL* of CSC 108, 148, and 165 (see CSC108H1-B, CSC148H1, CSC165H1 qualifications). Enthusiasm and patience for face-to-face teaching of beginners is required. Experience with CSC 104 or Racket preferred.
courses.duties: Hold office hours on a weekly basis to assist students taking 100-level CSC courses.
